normalised: energy and utilities: solar rooftop subsidies

good news for all you homeowners in kerala dreaming of going solar! the ministry of new and renewable energy (M N R E) just announced boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations. think of all the savings you can make – enough to afford plenty of onam sadhya!

unnormalised: Good news for all you homeowners in Kerala dreaming of going solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations. Think of all the savings you can make – enough to afford plenty of Onam sadhya!
normalised: under the revamped scheme, individual households can get up to forty percent subsidy for systems up to three kilowatt. for those needing more juice, systems between three kilowatt and ten kilowatt are eligible for a twenty percent subsidy. imagine generating your own power and cutting down those hefty electricity bills, especially during the hot chennai summers!

unnormalised: Under the revamped scheme, individual households can get up to 40% subsidy for systems up to 3 kW. For those needing more juice, systems between 3 kW and 10 kW are eligible for a 20% subsidy. Imagine generating your own power and cutting down those hefty electricity bills, especially during the hot Chennai summers!
normalised: the catch? you will need to use domestically manufactured solar panels and inverters. think "made in india"! this helps support our own businesses and creates jobs.

unnormalised: The catch? You’ll need to use domestically manufactured solar panels and inverters. Think "Made in India"! This helps support our own businesses and creates jobs.
normalised: local D I S C O M s like K S E B are also streamlining the application process. word on the street is it is much easier now than it used to be. so, ditch the reliance on grid power, embrace solar, and enjoy guilt-free biryani with your savings! contact your nearest solar installer or check the M N R E website for more details. don't delay, this offer might not last forever!

unnormalised: Local DISCOMs like KSEB are also streamlining the application process. Word on the street is it's much easier now than it used to be. So, ditch the reliance on grid power, embrace solar, and enjoy guilt-free biryani with your savings! Contact your nearest solar installer or check the MNRE website for more details. Don't delay, this offer might not last forever!
